citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:30 on
17-Apr-19.
Inspector knocked on door and called contact number. Licensee indicated that he was unavailable and not close to
facility. Left property at 8:45.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:30 on
17-Apr-19.
Inspector knocked on door and called contact number.  Licensee indicated that he was unavailable and not close to
facility.  Left property at 8:45.
